meanings.definition: A person who explores the internet or cyberspace.
meanings.sent1: The cybernaut enjoyed discovering new websites online.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a cybernaut who loves browsing the web for information.
meanings.sent3: The cybernaut got lost in the vast sea of websites but eventually found their way back.
meanings.sent4: She was a fearless cybernaut, bravely venturing into the unknown corners of the internet.
meanings.sent5: The young cybernaut's curiosity led them to uncover hidden online treasures.

meanings.definition: To navigate or explore the internet or cyberspace.
meanings.sent1: I cybernauted through various online forums to gather research for my project.
meanings.sent2: She cybernauts daily to stay updated with the latest news and trends.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to cybernaut on the laptop keyboard, thinking it was a game.
meanings.sent4: His mind would cybernaut through the digital realm, seeking answers to his questions.
meanings.sent5: The team cybernauted through the virtual maze, solving puzzles along the way.
